profile.name: Fauzan Rizky
headline: Data Engineering
Solving Complex Problems.
Building Scalable Data Ecosystems.
Optimizing through Automation.
profile.about: I am a Data Engineer and Computer Science Master's student at the University of Sydney, specializing in data architectures and AI-driven automation. I focus on turning complex data challenges into scalable, production-ready ecosystems. I am currently open to freelance projects and collaboration opportunities. If you have a system to scale or a process to automate, let's connect.

timeline.title: Advanced Analytics
timeline.description: Optimized the MyTelkomsel recommendation system by re-engineering inefficient codebase and automating the production pipeline, achieving a 99.9% reduction in execution time (6m to 197ms)

timeline.title: Data Warehouse Engineer
timeline.description: Modernized legacy data infrastructure by migrating unstructured MySQL and API pipelines into a structured 6-layer warehouse using dbt and Airbyte. Implemented SCD Type 2 for historical tracking and leveraged dbt documentation as a metadata layer for AI products, while productionizing automated Airflow pipelines to ensure reliable data delivery via SFTP, SQS, and Email for global partners.

timeline.title: Bachelor of Information Systems
timeline.description: Graduated with a strong foundation in Database Management, Data Science & AI, and systems analysis.

timeline.title: Data Engineer
timeline.description: Initiate data platform, including an AI-powered self-service analytics (text2sql2insight) & auto-reconciliation engine that reduced ad-hoc requests by 40%. Built a serverless Data Lake that focused on low-cost data-infrastructure. Also engineered resilient scraping systems to bypass Cloudflare bot detection and optimized Airflow infrastructure to ensure 24/7 production stability.

timeline.title: Freelance: Software Engineer
timeline.description: Built end-to-end automated reconciliation engine, managing everything from core application logic to cloud infrastructure (AWS) via Terraform. Architected a system to automate financial data ingestion across 27+ diverse biller websites. Navigating complex challenges like automated captcha resolution, transforming manual processing into a fully autonomous, production-ready data ecosystem

timeline.title: Master of Computer Science
timeline.description: Advancing expertise in the field of Computer Science. Specializing in Data Science & AI and Cybersecurity

projects.title: Learntelligence: AI Generated Course App
projects.description: Me and my team built AI Generated Course App for COMPFEST-16 AI Innovation Challenge. My role in this project is to fine-tune LLM Model (Phi-3 with Unsloth), and develop backend logic that are relevant to the Model (Create chapters, materials, quiz)

projects.title: FitFirst
projects.description: A personal diet assistant mobile application with workout plan, diet plan, calories analysis, and tracker for workout and diet goals. My role in this project is to build a workout recommender system using cosine similarity, and image classification to identify food nutrients from image.

projects.title: Social Media Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: I collect Twitter data (ùïè) using web scraping via Selenium. Next, I reformat the data, translate tweets, and use a RoBERTa model for sentiment analysis. Once the data is cleaned and structured, it's uploaded to BigQuery. Finally, I showcase and deploy various visualizations in Streamlit.

projects.title: Indonesia Stock Exchange Analytics
projects.description: I analyzed LQ45 index companies by gathering financial reports and stock price data via the Yahoo Finance API. After performing ETL processes with Mage AI on a Google VM, I used BigQuery SQL to explore the data and identify trends. Finally, I created a Tableau dashboard to visualize the financial health and performance trends of LQ45 companies.
